What I offer

AI Workshop

You'll leave the workshop with practical skills. We work on your everyday problems with AI - so the workshop has immediate value for you.

What we can focus on:

  • Writing content with AI
  • Working with numbers - analytics and reports
  • Working with specific language models and tools that connect with them
  • Process automation - we look together where automation makes sense
  • Creating visuals with AI
AI Showcase

Introduction to the world of AI. You'll understand its capabilities and limitations, see what you can actually do with it. I demystify the technology and open you up to new ways of working.

Topics: AI basics, business applications, live demo, ethics and risks, decision framework.

I offer both a short session for the busy, and a full-day workshop where we'll learn the intuition of working with AI together.

Hourly Support

I offer regular support tailored to your needs - I get into your work, understand the context and help solve problems where they appear. We learn together on your challenges at a pace adapted to the company's needs.

Fractional Operations & Project Support

For companies that need someone to help implement AI in daily operations - not just teach, but be part of the team for a set time.

What I can bring:

  • Identifying where AI makes business sense
  • Coordination between technical teams and business
  • Managing AI projects from idea to implementation
  • Regular support in making decisions about tools

20 years of experience in operational management and IT team management. I understand how companies work - not just technology.

Why work with me

Operational experience

20 years managing teams and projects - from 1 to 100 people. I know how companies work, understand processes and know where AI will actually help.

Hands-on approach

I'm co-building an HRTech startup - everything I teach, I test on my own product. I don't theorize, I show what works.

Business mindset

AI is a tool, not magic. I'll show you where it makes business sense, where it doesn't, and how to make informed decisions without burning through your budget.

Bilingual

Polish and English - working with international teams for years. I understand cultural differences in approaching technology.

I work with a wide range of AI tools - from popular LLMs (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini) to automation tools (n8n, Lindly), vibe coding (Lovable) and content creation (Canva, Descript). But it's not the list of tools that defines my value - it's the ability to choose the right solution for your problem.

Ready to work together?
